attributes.action: Scrap the plan to award themselves 25 pounds a day expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After saying that there would be no more expenses without receipts the Government have awarded themselves 25 pounds a day without having to prove where they spent it.  They will be entitled to this if they stay away from their first homes.   This could amount to as much as 9000 pounds a year and there is no way to ascertain when and where they stayed during that time

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
